item.title: Hello World!
item.description: $ printf "%s\n" 'Hello, World!' Hello, World! I’m starting a fresh blog site and this is my first post. I’ll try my best to post frequently and keep the site alive. A brief introduction I’ve been living in Japan for a very long time. I currently work in a Japanese company (been working there for more than a decade now). In the beginning, I’ve had the chance to work as a technical support staff for one year.
